For An Angle

The Blessed

By: Seaira Allen

God bless you
sleeping so soft
by young king's side.
Leaving us here to remember you.
The way you made us feel,
and the way you held your pride,
but when you
left us here
no longer by our side.

Left with out you
we no longer felt the same.
No longer haveing you, we cried.
So I say God bless you
when all along God blessed us
with you, and our fears subside.
God bless you
sleeping so soft
by young king's side.

Deep thoughts

Deep thoughts

By: Seaira Allen

She walks along side
the water's edge. Forever
inbound by the thoughts the haunt
the sleep of the forgotten.

Now knowing the she connot hide.
Traped by what she cannot see. Never
to leave the hateful silence to flaunt.
She'll be a unfrequented misbegotten.

Giving up all once desired pride.
She will not endeavor
in the cage which she stays dreaming of jaunt.
They treat her with a rotten

attitude. Now they know she lied
about her past. They didn't mind, however
they did with much joy taunt
her. When they stoped she was frozen.

Finding

Finding

By SeairaAllen

In a thousand pieces
I walked to find the place
of which I will find peace.
There I may find the pieces
of which I walked to find the place
where I will find pleasure.

If I cannot find what I desire
the way of my people will consider me dead
the thoughts of my people grows deep
within. One of the wize men will desire
to walk with tho so called "dead".
He wanted to see what some call the "dreamers".

Someday I'll have the courage
and the ability to meet you, the connection
must be strong, and true. A cartouche
will be found, by the one who has little courage
and, yet he alone can repair the connection
which has been broken by the cartouche and one who cavils.

i pissedoff one of my friends and i think i shouldnt have but i kept saying one more time and im gona

well i got tired of sayin dat and just blew up! was dat wrong?(i didint really blow up i just told her that its enuf no more stop)

well maybe you should know why i blew up......

ok she is totally inlove wit dis famous person and she has his pics everywhere! she even carved his name or his band symble into her anckle she started crying when she thought that he was getting married, she thinks she's really talking to him online she also said that he said he loved her.......

the bad thing is that she thinks she is gona marry him this may sound a bit mean but she's not really the prettest girl in skool but im not either well im no barbarie (sorry i suck at spelling) any way no one really likes her like that only friends anyway she went vegi. when she found out dat they dont ate meat........ i think its just stupid and so does everyone else bu no one was telling her that this is/ was gettin outa hand well i did and i feel great i have that off my chest

but now she hates me and she said if i wanted to take it back or say sorry that i can hold my breath untill i die which i really dont care i i'm not gona take it back because thats the way i feel about it.. Lost

um..... all most all my friends know what they want to do... like for a job and stuff.... i know i want to go to college and everything but i dont know what i want to study..... i have the jobs you know the DREAM JOBS but i need a soild job one i can fall back on....... buti dont know what i want to do.......... its not right...... my mom and dad say i shouldn't worry about it... i have time........ yeah like 4 years what if i dont find out by then?????? and besides i need to start taking the classes i need to do whatever it is.........

well i believe that people forgot how to share their Happiness, joy, hartbreaks, hopes, fears, and their dreams........

Dirty little People.....

I'm sure you can imagine

As plain as you can be
The place is Picadilly
The player He and She

She whispered "Will it hurt me?"

"Of course not" answered he
"It's a very simple process,
You can rely on me."

She said "I'm frightened,

I've not had this before.
My friend has had it five times.
And said it can be sore."

Then finally contented

Laid back and relaxed a bit
Quickly and readily he bent over her
And then he started it

It was growing rather painful

Tears formed in her eyes
It was hurting quite a bit now
It must have been quite a size

"Calm yourself," he whispered

His face was filled with a grin
"Try and open a bit wider
So I can get it in".

"It's coming now,"he whispered.

"I know."she cried in a bliss
Feeling it deep within her now
She said "I am glad I am having this.."

And with final effort

She gave a frightened shout.
He gripped it in anguish
And quickly pulled it out.

She lay back quite contented

Sighed and gave a smile
She said," I am glad I came now
You made it worth my while."

Now if you read this carefully

The dentist you will find..
Is not what you imagined
It's just your dirty mind!!

IS'NT IT FUNNY????

Isnt it funny that when you go to the shops with your friends you look down at the girl with black jeans and studs but smile at the girl wearing a a mini with a tshirt that barely cover anything?

Isnt it funny you can change your music taste to impress a guy but when it comes to a girl who likes her own music and her own style, you give her a mouthful?

Isnt it funny that a guy can get away with being a gangsta but the emo gets a mouthful from everyone

- Are you laughing?

Isnt it funny an emo can be quiet all through the week but gets more shit from everyone than the girl who sleeps around and sells her virginity?

Isnt it funny that you dont mind your friends drinking, smoking but the minute someone mentions emo music you can give them a lecture on melodramatic teenage outcasts?

- Im not laughing

Its so funny that you and your friends can make a girls life hell and not know anything about the silent battle she might be fighting.

Isnt it funny that you can call emos, punks, goths the retards but still manage to get through your day without an inch of guilt in your heart.

How can you call a girl a poser, how can you say "you're emo" or "attention seeker" without spending a second trying to figure out why there are cuts on her wrists and why she spends her lunchtimes crying instead of laughing with her friends

- Keep on laughing

Isnt it funny you can say and do all this without any idea of what is going on in this persons life

without knowing her situation with her friends

or her family

or her Life

Brave isnt going up on stage and stripping

Brave is not saying a speech

Or dumping your boyfriend

Brave is

Going to school on mufti day and not for a second caring what the whores around you are saying about your clothes

Its listening to your own music and being proud of it

Its going through every day with the things people say to your face and behind your back and you still keep quiet

Its knowing what your "friends" are saying about you and still calling them your friends

Brave is knowing that tomorrow isnt a bright and happy future

Its another day of bitching and dodging rumours

- Laugh if you must, but it is NOT funny.
